昞字的基本解释

昞
bǐng
古同“炳”，明；明亮：“坐见天将昞。”

昞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》兵永切，上梗，幫。］
同“炳1”。
明；明亮。

昞字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昞； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页492第20
【廣韻】兵永切【集韻】補永切，?音丙。與炳同。亮也。【博雅】明也。　又【集韻】陂病切，音柄。義同。　又昉古作昞。註詳四畫。

昞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
昞字的起名意思

明；明亮。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
bǐng
Gu Tong "Bing", Ming; Bright: "Sit down and see the generals of heaven."
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǐng］
["Guang Yun" Bing Yong cuts, on the stem, help. ]
Same as "Bing 1".
Ming; bright.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　昞; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 492 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Bing Yong Qi [Ji Yun] Make up Yong Qi,? Sound C. Same with Bing. Bright also. [Bo Ya] Ming Ye.　[Jiyun] Pi is sick and cut, and the sound handle. The same meaning.　Yuan Gu Zuozhen again. Note the four paintings in detail.
